Package com.github.oeuvres.alix.web

Interface Link

public interface Link
Automates tabs link in a navigation bar.

  • Method Details

    • href

      String href()
      The link to page relative to root
      Returns:
      <a href="{href}?…">

    • label

      String label()
      A text label for a link.
      Returns:
      <a>{label}</a>

    • hint

      String hint()
      Text representing advisory information about the link.
      Returns:
      <a title="{hint}">

    • pars

      String[] pars()
      Http parameters to keep on links
      Returns:
      <a href="…?{par}=value&{par}=value">

    • a

      static void a(Link tab, StringBuilder sb, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, String hrefHome)
      Display a tab as an html link <a>.
      Parameters:
      tab - A Link object.
      sb - A String build to append to.
      request - The http request to keep params.
      hrefHome - The base url.

    • nav

      default String nav(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, String hrefHome)
      Loop on tabs to build a nav bar.
      Parameters:
      request - to get parameters values ServletRequest.getParameter(String).
      hrefHome - href prefix.
      Returns:
      html for a nav bar.
